entry.title: Coinbase Adds Support for Polygon and Solana Simplifying Access to Web3 The move will simplify sending assets across networks
entry.summary: Coinbase, the largest crypto exchange in the U.S., has enabled transfers on Ethereum competitor Solana and on scaling solution Polygon.
